description:
The fourth event of the 2022 Grand Chess Tour, the Saint Louis Rapid & Blitz, is scheduled to take place from August 24 to August 30, 2022, in Saint Louis, Missouri, United States. This is the last rapid and blitz tournament of the 2022 tour. It will be formatted as a 10-player round robin, with the players  competing for a $175,000 prize fund.

If Hikaru Nakamura places first place in the Saint Louis Rapid & Blitz, this market will resolve to “Yes”. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No". If either portion of the tournament is cancelled or otherwise does not begin by August 30, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No". If either portion of the tournament starts by August 30, 2022, but does not finish by September 6, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

First place in the Saint Louis Rapid & Blitz will be determined by the sum total of points a player receives for their participation in both the Rapid and Blitz portions of the tournament.

The primary resolution source for this market will be https://grandchesstour.org/; however, other credible reporting may be used.

markets.question: Will Hikaru Nakamura win the 2022 Saint Louis Rapid & Blitz?
